Fsm
Class State

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Fsm.State
public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object

States are defined for use in one of more Transitions. Every State has a name (for textual identification).

To use this class, you extend it. Most real FSMs will have some persistent information that is maintained, so you can define that in your concrete class.

See Also:
Transition
